text: Lloyd George Knew My Father (or My Father Knew Lloyd George) may refer to: *Lloyd George Knew My Father (song), an English schoolboy song *Lloyd George Knew My Father (play), a 1972 play by William Douglas-Home *My Father Knew Lloyd George (TV programme), a 1965 British one-off television show ==See also== *Lloyd George *Onward, Christian Soldiers
title: Lloyd George Knew My Father
